subject: Yankee Stadium (NYC)
Citi Field (NYC)
Stadiums and Arenas
Restaurants
Food
lead_paragraph: A $5 hot dog was often the default meal at Shea Stadium and the old Yankee Stadium, since there were few better choices. But food is not an afterthought at their replacements.
